meanings.sent1: She studied hard, hence she passed the test.
meanings.sent2: He forgot his umbrella, hence he got wet in the rain.
meanings.sent3: Tom ate too much cake, hence he felt sick afterwards.
meanings.sent4: The team practiced diligently, hence they won the championship.
meanings.sent5: The sun was shining brightly, hence the flowers bloomed beautifully.

meanings.sent1: She left the party early, hence she missed the surprise.
meanings.sent2: The cat jumped off the table, hence it landed on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The bird flew away, hence it disappeared into the sky.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel climbed the tree, hence it reached the top branch.
meanings.sent5: The book fell off the shelf, hence it landed on the carpet.

meanings.sent1: He didn't study for the exam, hence he failed.
meanings.sent2: She loves to read, hence she has a large collection of books.
meanings.sent3: The store was closed, hence they had to find another place to shop.
meanings.sent4: The road was blocked, hence they had to take a detour.
meanings.sent5: The cake was delicious, hence everyone asked for the recipe.
